title: A Show Member Pulled Over During Lockdown + Luke Bryan’s Wife Caroline Talks Quarantine Life + Name That Instrument!
itunes:title: A Show Member Pulled Over During Lockdown + Luke Bryan’s Wife Caroline Talks Quarantine Life + Name That Instrument!
description:
Raymundo got pulled over by a cop because of his car and then had to prove he was an essential worker. Caroline Bryan talks to us all about how quarantine and home schooling is going right now. Her and Amy also talk about the hardest part of being a mom. Bobby plays an instrument he found laying around his house and the show has to name what song he’s playing. Also, the Secret Celebrity is revealed!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
